name: RAG-Driven-Generative-AI (Denis2054)
description: [项目级] This repository provides programs to build Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) code for Generative AI with LlamaIndex, Deep Lake, and Pinecone leveraging the power of OpenAI and Hugging Face models for generation and evaluation.。来源: https://github.com/Denis2054/RAG-Driven-Generative-AI

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
This repository provides programs to build Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) code for Generative AI with LlamaIndex, Deep Lake, and Pinecone leveraging the power of OpenAI and Hugging Face models for generation and evaluation.

来源: https://github.com/Denis2054/RAG-Driven-Generative-AI
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 571
